MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v3 - A3: Subject Family History

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

AFFFAMM.Description: Are there affected first-degree relatives (biological parents, full siblings, or biological children)?

FADMUT.Description: In this family, is there evidence for an AD mutation? If Yes, select predominant mutation.

FADMUSO.Description: Source of evidence for AD mutation. (Blank if FADMUT in {0, 9})

FADMUSOX.Description: If Yes, Other (specify) (Blank if FADMUT in {0, 9} or FADMUSO ≠ 8)

FFTDMUT.Description: In this family, is there evidence for an FTLD mutation? If Yes, select predominant mutation.

FFTDMUSO.Description: Source of evidence for FTLD mutation. (Blank if FFTDMUT in {0, 9})

FFTDMUSX.Description: If Yes, Other (specify) (Blank if FFTDMUT in {0, 9} or FFTDMUSO ≠ 8)

FOTHMUT.Description: In this family, is there evidence for a mutation other than an AD or FTLD mutation?.

FOTHMUSO.Description: Source of evidence for other mutation. (Blank if FOTHMUT in {0, 9})

FOTHMUSX.Description: If Yes, Other (specify) (Blank if FOTHMUT in {0, 9} or FOTHMUSO ≠ 8)

Levels.4: Other neurologic condition such as multiple sclerosis or stroke
Levels.5: Psychiatric condition such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or alcoholism
Levels.8: N/A, no neurological problem or psychiatric condition

MOMMOE.Description: Mother - method of evaluation (Blank if MOMNEUR in {8, 9})

Levels.3: Medical record review from formal dementia evaluation
Levels.4: Review of general medical records AND co-participant and/or subject telephone interview
Levels.5: Review of general medical records only

MOMAGEO.Description: Mother - age of onset (Blank if MOMNEUR in {8, 9})

Levels.4: Other neurologic condition such as multiple sclerosis or stroke
Levels.5: Psychiatric condition such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or alcoholism
Levels.8: N/A, no neurological problem or psychiatric condition

DADMOE.Description: Father - method of evaluation (Blank if DADNEUR in {8, 9})

Levels.3: Medical record review from formal dementia evaluation
Levels.4: Review of general medical records AND co-participant and/or subject telephone interview
Levels.5: Review of general medical records only

DADAGEO.Description: Father - age of onset (Blank if DADNEUR in {8, 9})

Levels.4: Other neurologic condition such as multiple sclerosis or stroke
Levels.5: Psychiatric condition such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or alcoholism
Levels.8: N/A, no neurological problem or psychiatric condition

SIB{d}MOE.Description: Sibling {d} - method of evaluation (Blank if SIB{d}NEU in {{8, 9}})

Levels.3: Medical record review from formal dementia evaluation
Levels.4: Review of general medical records AND co-participant and/or subject telephone interview
Levels.5: Review of general medical records only

SIB{d}AGO.Description: Sibling {d} - age of onset (Blank if SIB{d}NEU in {{8, 9}})

Levels.4: Other neurologic condition such as multiple sclerosis or stroke
Levels.5: Psychiatric condition such as schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or alcoholism
Levels.8: N/A, no neurological problem or psychiatric condition

KID{d}MOE.Description: Child {d} - method of evaluation (Blank if KID{d}NEU in {{8, 9}})

Levels.3: Medical record review from formal dementia evaluation
Levels.4: Review of general medical records AND co-participant and/or subject telephone interview
Levels.5: Review of general medical records only

KID{d}AGO.Description: Child {d} - age of onset (Blank if KID{d}NEU in {{8, 9}})
